short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add code share abilities to browser messangers like WhatsApp Web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Codequest is a powerful extension that brings code sharing abilities to your favorite browser messengers, such as WhatsApp Web. Say goodbye to the hassle of copying and pasting code snippets from one platform to another. With Codequest, you can effortlessly share code with your friends, colleagues, or clients directly from your browser messenger.

Whether you're a developer, a student, or just someone who frequently shares code online, Codequest is a must-have tool in your arsenal. It's fast, convenient, and incredibly easy to use. Simply install the extension, and you're ready to start sharing code in seconds.

With Codequest, you can:

Share code snippets: Easily share code snippets with syntax highlighting and formatting intact. No more losing formatting or indentation when pasting code into messenger platforms.

Collaborate in real-time: Collaborate with your team or friends on coding projects in real-time. Get instant feedback and make changes together seamlessly.

Boost productivity: Say goodbye to the hassle of switching between different platforms or tools to share code. Codequest streamlines the process and helps you be more productive.

Customize code appearance: Customize the appearance of your code snippets with various themes, fonts, and styles to make them more visually appealing and easier to read.

Enhance communication: Improve communication with your team or clients by sharing code directly within your browser messenger. No more confusion or misunderstandings caused by lengthy explanations.

Codequest is the ultimate tool for developers, designers, and anyone who needs to share code snippets in their browser messengers. Enhance your coding workflow and communication with Codequest today!

Note: Codequest is not affiliated with or endorsed by WhatsApp or any other browser messengers. It's an independent extension developed to enhance your code sharing experience.
